faq.title: Questions About AI Implementation & Development
faq.subtitle: We answer the most common questions about our software development and AI consulting services.

items.question: What technologies do you use for software development?
items.answer: We use the MEVN stack (MariaDB/MongoDB, Express, Vue.js, Node.js) combined with AWS services for cloud infrastructure. We also integrate OpenAI API, Tailwind CSS, and Nuxt for high-performance applications. Each project is designed with scalable architecture following enterprise security standards.

items.question: How can AI help my business?
items.answer: The Capibara Web's AI solutions automate 40% of your repetitive tasks, from data processing to customer support with intelligent chatbots. We implement OpenAI solutions that integrate directly into your existing workflows, reducing operating costs by up to 70% and improving response times from days to minutes.

items.question: Do you offer SaaS solutions for the healthcare sector?
items.answer: Yes, we specialize in HealthTech. We have developed platforms such as Medicynia (medical management SaaS) and Doctor Digital (a network of over 10 platforms for specialists). Our solutions include electronic clinical records, telemedicine, intelligent scheduling, and automated billing, all compliant with Mexican health regulations.

items.question: How long does it take to develop a custom platform?
items.answer: The timeline varies by complexity. A functional MVP typically takes 8 to 12 weeks. Complete SaaS platforms with multiple modules can take 4 to 6 months. We work with agile methodologies (Scrum) with incremental deliveries every 2 weeks so you can see real progress from the start.

items.question: Do you work with international companies?
items.answer: Yes, we have 12 years of experience working with companies in Mexico, the United States, and Canada. We have developed national job portals in the U.S. (Education America) and industrial-scale IoT systems (Agtronix). Our team works on flexible time zones with bilingual Spanish-English communication.

items.question: What does your AI training service include?
items.answer: Our program includes: diagnosis of automatable processes, practical workshops with OpenAI tools, guided implementation of AI solutions in your daily operations, and ongoing post-training support. Teams learn to use AI with real cases from their industry, not just theory. Measurable results from the first week of implementation.

items.question: How do you improve my company's web positioning?
items.answer: We implement SEO, AEO, and LLMO strategies from the project architecture. We use Schema.org structured data, SSG/SSR rendering for crawlers, optimized Core Web Vitals, and semantic content that allows search engines and generative AIs to identify your brand as an authority in your sector.
